DOC.brief_summary: To see if four sessions of light therapy successfully treats nail fungus.
DOC.brief_title: Using Light Therapy to Treat Toe Nail Fungus
DOC.detailed_description: This study is a one year study which includes four treatment sessions of light therapy looking for clinical and mycological improvement.
DOC.criteria: toe nail fungus, not infolving lunula between ages 1870 years old not on systemic antifungal medications
